      • Setup

        Generate ABC public and private keys.
        Parameters:
        attrSize - maximum size of attribute supported.

        ABC parameter

      • Issuing

        public ABCcred Issuing(ABCpk pk,
                       java.lang.String[] A,
                       ABCsk sk)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        ABC Issuing protocol. It contains precomputation MPEncode(A) and MPEncode(A-o) where A={m_1,...,m_n-1,o}.
        Parameters:
        pk - ABC public key.
        A - Attribute set
        sk - ABC secret key.
        Returns:
        an ABC credential
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if |A| is greater than supported attribute size it fails or the protocol fails.

      • proofOfPossession

        public boolean proofOfPossession(ABCpk pk,
                                 ABCcred cred)
        ABC Proof of Possession protocol. It precomputes MPEncode(A) on attribute set A.
        Parameters:
        pk - ABC public key.
        cred - ABC credential.
        Returns:
        true if the credential is legit corresponding to hidden attributes A; false otherwise.

      • proofOfAND

        public boolean proofOfAND(ABCpk pk,
                          ABCcred cred,
                          java.lang.String[] Aprime)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        ABC AND Proof protocol.
        Parameters:
        pk - ABC public key.
        cred - ABC credential.
        Aprime - query attribute set.
        Returns:
        true if A' is subset or equal to A, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the searching for intersecting attributes fails or the protocol fails.

      • proofOfANY

        public boolean proofOfANY(ABCpk pk,
                          ABCcred cred,
                          int threshold,
                          java.lang.String[] Aprime)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        ABC ANY Proof protocol.
        Parameters:
        pk - ABC public key.
        cred - ABC credential.
        threshold - the threshold \ell which is at most |A'| and at most |A|.
        Aprime - query attribute set.
        Returns:
        true if A' intersected A for at least threshold-many attributes, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the searching for intersecting attributes fails or the protocol fails.

      • proofOfNAND

        public boolean proofOfNAND(ABCpk pk,
                           ABCcred cred,
                           java.lang.String[] Aprime)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        ABC NAND Proof protocol.
        Parameters:
        pk - ABC public key.
        cred - ABC credential.
        Aprime - query attribute set.
        Returns:
        true if A' is disjoint to A, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the searching for differing attributes fails or the protocol fails.

      • proofOfNANY

        public boolean proofOfNANY(ABCpk pk,
                           ABCcred cred,
                           int threshold,
                           java.lang.String[] Aprime)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        ABC NANY Proof protocol.
        Parameters:
        pk - ABC public key.
        cred - ABC credential.
        threshold - the threshold \bar{\ell} is at most |A'| and at most |A|.
        Aprime - query attribute set.
        Returns:
        true if |A' - A| graeter than or equals to threshold, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the searching for differing attributes fails or the protocol fails.

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findSame

        public java.util.ArrayList[] findSame(int threshold,
                                      java.lang.String[] A,
                                      java.lang.String[] Aprime)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Search for the intersecting attributes.
        Parameters:
        threshold - the set intersection threshold.
        A - user attribute set.
        Aprime - query attribute set.
        Returns:
        A' \cup A and the remain A' - A = A' - (A \cup A').
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the searching for intersecting attributes fails.

      • findNotSame

        public java.util.ArrayList[] findNotSame(int threshold,
                                         java.lang.String[] A,
                                         java.lang.String[] Aprime)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Search for the differing attributes.
        Parameters:
        threshold - the set intersection threshold.
        A - user attribute set.
        Aprime - query attribute set.
        Returns:
        A' - A and the remain A' \cup A = A' - (A' - A).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the searching for differing attributes fails.

      • MPEncode

        public org.apache.milagro.amcl.BLS48.BIG[] MPEncode(org.apache.milagro.amcl.BLS48.BIG[] A,
                                                    org.apache.milagro.amcl.BLS48.BIG order)
        Encode monic polynomial roots into coefficients.
        Parameters:
        A - attribute set that represent the roots.
        order - the elliptic curve (sub-)group order.
        Returns:
        coefficients of a monic polynomial.

      • syntheticDivision

        public org.apache.milagro.amcl.BLS48.BIG[][] syntheticDivision(org.apache.milagro.amcl.BLS48.BIG[] dvdend,
                                                               org.apache.milagro.amcl.BLS48.BIG[] dvsor)
        Synthetic division algorithm for polynomial division.
        Parameters:
        dvdend - coefficients of dividend.
        dvsor - coefficients of divisor.
        Returns:
        first element BIG[0] as coefficients of quotient and the last element BIG[1] as coefficients of remainder.

        Returns:
